languages.text: "Довольно! Слушай сюда, пустотный клещ. Когда я щелкну пальцами, твой язык чудесным образом развяжется, и все останутся довольны и невредимы. А если нет..."

traits.locale_text: "Довольно! Слушай сюда, пустотный клещ. Когда я щелкну пальцами, твой язык чудесным образом развяжется, и все останутся довольны и невредимы. А если нет..."

languages.text: "Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."
languages.original_text: "Довольно! Слушай сюда, пустотный клещ. Когда я щелкну пальцами, твой язык чудесным образом развяжется, и все останутся довольны и невредимы. А если нет..."

traits.locale_text: "That is enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, everyone will stay happy and no one gets hurt. But if it will not..."
"That is enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, everyone will stay happy and no one gets hurt. But if it will not..."
"That is enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, and everyone here will continue to be safe and sound. But if it will not..."
"That is enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, and everyone here will continue to be safe and sound. But if it will not..."
"Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."
"Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."

languages.text: "Genug! Jetzt hört mir mal zu, Ihr Leerenmilbe. Wenn ich mit den Fingern schnippe, wird sich Eure Zunge auf magische Weise lösen, ich bekomme, was ich will, und dann bleiben alle hier unversehrt. Wenn aber nicht ..."
languages.original_text: "Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."

traits.locale_text: "Genug! Jetzt hört mir mal zu, Ihr Leerenmilbe. Wenn ich mit den Fingern schnippe, wird sich Eure Zunge auf magische Weise lösen, ich bekomme, was ich will, und dann bleiben alle hier unversehrt. Wenn aber nicht ..."

languages.text: «¡Basta! Escúchame, miserable gorgojo del vacío. Cuando chasquee los dedos, vas a notar que tu lengua se afloja, yo quedaré satisfecha y todos nos vamos de una pieza. O si no...».
languages.original_text: "Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Basta! Escúchame, miserable gorgojo del vacío. Cuando chasquee los dedos, vas a notar que tu lengua se afloja, yo quedaré satisfecha y todos nos vamos de una pieza. O si no...».

languages.text: 「十分だ！いいか、よく聞け、ヴォイドのダニめ。私が指を鳴らせば、お前の舌は奇跡的にほどけ、私は満足してここにいる全員が無事でいられる。けれどそうでなければ…」
languages.original_text: "Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."

traits.locale_text: 「十分だ！いいか、よく聞け、ヴォイドのダニめ。私が指を鳴らせば、お前の舌は奇跡的にほどけ、私は満足してここにいる全員が無事でいられる。けれどそうでなければ…」

languages.text: “够了！仔细听我说话，你这个渣滓。我马上会打个响指，而你的嘴巴会奇迹般地撬开，说出我想知道的事情。只要我心满意足，这边所有人就都能活命，可如果我不满意的话……”
languages.original_text: "Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."

traits.locale_text: “够了！仔细听我说话，你这个渣滓。我马上会打个响指，而你的嘴巴会奇迹般地撬开，说出我想知道的事情。只要我心满意足，这边所有人就都能活命，可如果我不满意的话……”

languages.text: « Assez ! Écoutez-moi bien, vermine du vide. Quand je claquerai des doigts, votre langue va mystérieusement se délier, pour mon plus grand plaisir, et tout le monde restera en un seul morceau. Si, en revanche, vous persistez à vous taire... »
languages.original_text: "Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."

traits.locale_text: « Assez ! Écoutez-moi bien, vermine du vide. Quand je claquerai des doigts, votre langue va mystérieusement se délier, pour mon plus grand plaisir, et tout le monde restera en un seul morceau. Si, en revanche, vous persistez à vous taire... »

languages.text: "Yeter! Beni dinle uçsuz böceği. Parmaklarımı şaklattığımda dilinin bağı mucizevi bir şekilde çözülecek. Ben memnun olacağım ve buradaki kimsenin saçının teline bile zarar gelmeyecek. Ancak dilinin bağı çözülmezse..."
languages.original_text: "Enough! Now listen to me, you void mite. When I snap my fingers, your tongue will miraculously untie, I will be satisfied, and everyone here will stay in one piece. But if it will not..."
